data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Hezhou, Guangxi, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hezhou, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Hezhou are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Hezhou, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Hezhou with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, 0.9% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Hezhou, Guangxi, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 140,284 people in Hezhou who are far from you. Please add 30 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hezhou, Guangxi, China has a population of 151,800.

We estimate Hezhou has 11,516 people who might know Jesus, 2,452 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 137,832 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Hezhou, Guangxi, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
